backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report stub declaring a feature evidence report with no features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all major frontend files in the CV application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utilities with extensive OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing all CV sections with navigation, SEO hook, and a custom footer.
frontend/src/components/cv/ContactSectio: Renders a grid of contact methods with icons and links filtered from provided contact data.
frontend/src/components/cv/EducationSect: Displays education entries with degree, institution, dates, location, and optional bullet details.
frontend/src/components/cv/ExperienceSec: Renders a vertical timeline of work experience with role, company, dates, and bullet descriptions.
frontend/src/components/cv/HeroSection.t: Hero header showing profile image, name, title, summary, and CTA buttons with background image.
frontend/src/components/cv/ProjectsSecti: Shows project cards with descriptions, technologies, and links to demos and source code.
frontend/src/components/cv/Section.tsx: Reusable layout wrapper that standardizes section spacing and typography.
frontend/src/components/cv/SkillsSection: Displays categorized skill groups with badge-style tags.
frontend/src/components/cv/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll-based active section highlighting and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/data/cv.ts: Defines CV-related TypeScript interfaces and provides static CV data including hero, experience, education, skills, projects, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder for future backend query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoFromCvData.ts: Updates document title and meta tags using hero CV data for SEO and social sharing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables, dark mode settings, and global layout rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, React Query client, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current requirements, issues, and pending tasks related to applying a profile photo.
